verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; of a whole \w piece|strong="H4749"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them: that thou mayest \w use|strong="H1961"\w* them for the \w calling|strong="H4744"\w* of the \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w*, and for the \w journeying|strong="H4550"\w* of the \w camps|strong="H4264"\w*.

And when they shall \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* with \w them|strong="H2004"\w*, all the \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* shall \w assemble|strong="H3259"\w* themselves to thee at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And if they \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* \add but\add* with \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add trumpet\add*, then the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*, \add which are\add* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, shall \w gather|strong="H3259"\w* themselves unto thee.

When ye \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* an \w alarm|strong="H8643"\w*, then the \w camps|strong="H4264"\w* that \w lie|strong="H2583"\w* on the east \w parts|strong="H6924"\w* shall go \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*.

When ye \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* an \w alarm|strong="H8643"\w* the second \w time|strong="H8145"\w*, then the \w camps|strong="H4264"\w* that \w lie|strong="H2583"\w* on the south \w side|strong="H8486"\w* shall take their \w journey|strong="H5265"\w*: they shall \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* an \w alarm|strong="H8643"\w* for their \w journeys|strong="H4550"\w*.
But when the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* is to be gathered \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, ye shall \w blow|strong="H8628"\w*, but ye shall not sound an \w alarm|strong="H7321"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, shall \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*; and they shall be to you for an \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

And if ye \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w* in your \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w against|strong="H6862"\w* the enemy that \w oppresseth|strong="H6887"\w* you, then ye shall blow an \w alarm|strong="H7321"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*; and ye shall be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and ye shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* from your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

Also in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of your \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, and in your solemn \w days|strong="H4150"\w*, and in the \w beginnings|strong="H7218"\w* of your \w months|strong="H2320"\w*, ye shall \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* over your burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and over the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of your peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*; that they may be to you for a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass on the \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \add day\add* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, that the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* was taken \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from off the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w took|strong="H5265"\w* their \w journeys|strong="H4550"\w* out of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*; and the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w rested|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*.

And they \w first|strong="H7223"\w* took their \w journey|strong="H5265"\w* according to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ In the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \add place\add* \w went|strong="H5265"\w* the \w standard|strong="H1714"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* according to their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*: and over his host \add was\add* \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*.

And over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* \add was\add* \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zuar|strong="H6686"\w*.

And over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* \add was\add* \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Helon|strong="H2497"\w*.

And the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* was taken \w down|strong="H3381"\w*; and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w* and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

¶ And the \w standard|strong="H1714"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w* according to their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*: and over his \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \add was\add* \w Elizur|strong="H0468"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shedeur|strong="H7707"\w*.

And over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \add was\add* \w Shelumiel|strong="H8017"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zurishaddai|strong="H6701"\w*.

And over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \add was\add* \w Eliasaph|strong="H0460"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Deuel|strong="H1845"\w*.

And the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w* set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*: and \add the other\add* did set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* against they \w came|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 10.21 \ft the other: that is, the Gershonites and the Merarites\f*

¶ And the \w standard|strong="H1714"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w* according to their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*: and over his \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \add was\add* \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammihud|strong="H5989"\w*.

And over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \add was\add* \w Gamaliel|strong="H1583"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pedahzur|strong="H6301"\w*.

And over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \add was\add* \w Abidan|strong="H0027"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gideoni|strong="H1441"\w*.

¶ And the \w standard|strong="H1714"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, \add which was\add* the \w rereward|strong="H0622"\w* of all the \w camps|strong="H4264"\w* throughout their \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: and over his \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \add was\add* \w Ahiezer|strong="H0295"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammishaddai|strong="H5996"\w*.

And over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* \add was\add* \w Pagiel|strong="H6295"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ocran|strong="H5918"\w*.

And over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* \add was\add* \w Ahira|strong="H0299"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Enan|strong="H5881"\w*.

Thus \add  \+w were|strong="H0428"\+w*\add* the \w journeyings|strong="H4550"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* according to their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*, when they set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*.\f + \fr 10.28 \ft Thus: Heb. These\f*

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Hobab|strong="H2246"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Raguel|strong="H7467"\w* the \w Midianite|strong="H4084"\w*, \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, We are \w journeying|strong="H5265"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it you: \w come|strong="H3212"\w* thou with us, and we will do thee \w good|strong="H2895"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* concerning \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, I will not \w go|strong="H3212"\w*; but I will \w depart|strong="H3212"\w* to mine own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and to my \w kindred|strong="H4138"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Leave|strong="H5800"\w* us not, I pray thee; forasmuch as thou \w knowest|strong="H3651"\w* how we are to \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and thou mayest be to us instead of \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

And it shall be, if thou \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with us, yea, it shall be, that what \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w do|strong="H3190"\w* unto us, the same will we \w do|strong="H2895"\w* unto thee.

¶ And they \w departed|strong="H5265"\w* from the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days’|strong="H3117"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*: and the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w went|strong="H5265"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them in the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days’|strong="H3117"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*, to search \w out|strong="H8446"\w* a resting \w place|strong="H4496"\w* for them.

And the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add was\add* upon them by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, when they went \w out|strong="H5265"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

And it came to pass, when the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and let thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* be \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*; and let them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

And when it \w rested|strong="H5117"\w*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, unto the \w many|strong="H7233"\w* \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 10.36 \ft many thousands: Heb. ten thousand thousands\f*
